Class Board

java.lang.Object
  Board

public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

A method to handle the coordinates and the movement on the board NOTE: There are two teams ( 1 and 2 ). Board: 0 - empty space 1 - team one 2 - team two 3 - possible move

Version:
1.0
Author:
Paulius Kuzmickas

getBoardOfChange

public int[][] getBoardOfChange(int row,
                                int column,
                                int team)
Gets a 2d array which shows all of the pieces that will be changed after a move in a specific place.

Parameters:
row - the row from which to do the finding
column - the column from which to do the finding
team - the team for which to do the finding
Returns:
returns a 2d array of the board of change
